page = <Page url='https://practicesoftwaretesting.com/auth/login'>

    @allure.feature("User Authentication")
    @allure.story("User Login")
    @pytest.mark.ui
    def test_login_success(page: Page):
        """
        Test Case: User can login successfully.
        Validates that after login, user is redirected to account page.
        """
        # Create a fresh user via API
        import random, string
        username = ''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_lowercase, k=10))
        user_email = f"{username}@example.com"
        user_data = {
            "first_name": "Test",
            "last_name": "User",
            "email": user_email,
            "password": "Test1234!@",
            "dob": "1990-01-01",
            "phone": "5555555555",
            "address": {
                "street": "123 Test St",
                "city": "TestCity",
                "state": "TS",
                "country": "US",
                "postal_code": "12345"
            }
        }
        requests.post("https://api.practicesoftwaretesting.com/users/register", json=user_data)
    
        with allure.step("1. Navigate to Login Page"):
            page.goto("/auth/login")
            page.wait_for_load_state("networkidle")
    
        with allure.step("2. Login with valid credentials"):
            page.locator("[data-test='email']").fill(user_email)
            page.locator("[data-test='password']").fill("Test1234!@")
            page.locator("[data-test='login-submit']").click()
    
            # Wait for redirect
            page.wait_for_timeout(3000)
    
        with allure.step("3. Validate login was successful"):
            # Check if URL changed (should be /account)
            current_url = page.url
            print(f"Current URL: {current_url}")
